key_findings: Coordinated Attack: The SQL injection attempt and path traversal attack may be part of a larger, coordinated attack campaign.
Scanning Attempts: The multiple failed login attempts from a single IP may indicate a scanning or brute-force attack.
Unusual Agent Activity: The use of Python-requests and sqlmap agents suggests potential malicious activity or exploitation attempts.

indicators_of_compromise.indicator: Detected use of SQL injection pattern on /index.php endpoint using sqlmap tool
Detected attempt to access /etc/passwd file using directory traversal
Detected brute-force login attempts on /login endpoint
Detected use of Python-requests and sqlmap agents

mitre_techniques.name: Brute Force
mitre_techniques.description: Adversaries may use brute force techniques to gain access to accounts when passwords are unknown or when password hashes are obtained.

mitre_techniques.name: Upload Malicious File
mitre_techniques.description: Adversaries may attempt to exploit vulnerabilities in public-facing applications to gain access to systems.

owasp_vulnerabilities.name: Injection
owasp_vulnerabilities.description: Injection flaws occur when untrusted data is sent to an interpreter as part of a command or query.

owasp_vulnerabilities.name: Broken Access Control
owasp_vulnerabilities.description: Security misconfiguration is the most commonly seen issue, often resulting from insecure default configurations or incomplete configurations.

owasp_vulnerabilities.name: Identification and Authentication Failures
owasp_vulnerabilities.description: Authentication failures can allow attackers to assume other users' identities.

recommendations.title: Mitigate Brute Force
recommendations.description: Implement controls to prevent T1110: Brute Force

recommendations.title: Mitigate Upload Malicious File
recommendations.description: Implement controls to prevent T1190: Upload Malicious File

recommendations.title: Fix Broken Access Control
recommendations.description: Address A05:2021: Broken Access Control vulnerability

recommendations.title: Fix Identification and Authentication Failures
recommendations.description: Address A07:2021: Identification and Authentication Failures vulnerability
